data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <RelativeLayout
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="44dp"
        background="#fff0f0f0" >

        <ImageView
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            layout_marginLeft="5dp"
            click="column"
            contentDescription="@null"
            function="column"
            scaleType="fitXY"
            src="index_nav_columns" />

        <TextView
            layout_width="wrap_content"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_centerInParent="true"
            function="title"
            textColor="#FF000000"
            textSize="24dp" />

        <ImageView
            layout_width="44dp"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            layout_alignParentRight="true"
            layout_marginRight="5dp"
            click="fav_or_user"
            contentDescription="@null"
            function="fav_or_user"
            scaleType="fitXY"
            src="article_nav_fav" />
    </RelativeLayout>

    <ImageView
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="1.5dip"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="divider"
        scaleType="fitXY"
        src="index_nav_shadow" />

</LinearLayout>
